Package gw.api.startable

Interface IStartablePlugin

All Superinterfaces:
InternalPlugin, Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
ApiRoleSourcePlugin, AuthenticationSchemePlugin, AuthenticationVerifierPlugin, ExternalConfigurationProviderPlugin, GeocodePlugin, IAuthConfigPlugin, InboundIntegrationStartablePlugin, SignatureKeyProviderPlugin
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGeocodePlugin, AuthenticationVerifierCorePlugin, AuthenticationVerifierPlatformPlugin, DefaultRestAuthenticationSchemePlugin, FileSystemApiRoleSourcePlugin, SignatureKeyProviderPlatformPlugin, SignatureKeyProviderPluginBase, StartablePluginBase
public interface IStartablePlugin extends InternalPlugin

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    StartablePluginState
    getState()
     
    void
    start(StartablePluginCallbackHandler pluginCallbackHandler, boolean serverStarting)
    Called during server startup and from the UI.
    void
    stop(boolean serverShuttingDown)
    Called during server shutdown and from the UI

  • Method Details

    • start

      void start(StartablePluginCallbackHandler pluginCallbackHandler, boolean serverStarting) throws Exception
      Called during server startup and from the UI. All callback operations should be wrapped by the execute() method of the given StartablePluginCallbackHandler.
      Parameters:
      pluginCallbackHandler - Implementation of StartablePluginCallbackHandler that executes as the system user.
      serverStarting - true if the request comes from the fact that the server is starting; false if it comes from the UI
      Throws:
      Exception - To abort server startup

    • stop

      void stop(boolean serverShuttingDown)
      Called during server shutdown and from the UI
      Parameters:
      serverShuttingDown - true if the request comes from the fact that the server is shutting down; false if it comes from the UI

    • getState

      StartablePluginState getState()
      Returns:
      the State of this plugin
